summary: In 19th century San Francisco's Chinatown, American adventurer Gilbert De Quincey is saving slave girls owned by the Chinese Tong factions.
cast: Vincent Price|Linda Ho|Richard Loo|June Kyoto Lu|Philip Ahn|Yvonne Moray|Caroline Kido|Terence de Marney|Geri Hoo|Gerald Jann|Vivianne Manku|Miel Saan|Nobuko Miyamoto|John Fujioka|Keiko|Victor Sen Yung|Ralph Ahn|Arthur Wong|Alicia Li|Charles Horvath|Vincent Barbi|William Baskin|David Chow|Richard Fong|Roy Jenson|Angelo Rossitto|Carol Russell
title: Confessions of an Opium Eater
